title: Poster, ""Decision VII," Subway Po", 1993–94
inscribed: Imprinted, lower right: RUDOLPH W. GUILIANI, MAYOR, CITY OF NEW YORK MARGARET A. HAMBURG, M.D. COMMISSIONER, NEW YORK CITY DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH; Department of Health logo.
provenance: Gift of the Department of Health, New York City
creditline: Gift of the Department of Health, New York City
description: Poster is part of a series started in 1992 promoting AIDS awareness.  Text and images integrated  in style of comic strip.  Top text aligned vertically at left: Decision VII.  Botton text aligned verticall at left: La Decision VI (in spanish)

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, ""Decision VII," Subway Po", 1993–94.
1993–94. Lithograph on paper. Gift of the Department of Health, New York City. 1996-2-3.
